  • Ezekiel 48
1 The word of the Domina also came unto me, saying: 2 'Daughter of woman, thou dwellest in the midst of the rebellious house, that have eyes to see, and see not, that have ears to hear, and hear not; for they are a rebellious house. 3 Therefore, thou daughter of woman, prepare thee stuff for exile, and remove as though for exile by day in their sight; and thou shalt remove from thy place to another place in their sight; it may be they will perceive, for they are a rebellious house. 4 And thou shalt bring forth thy stuff by day in their sight, as stuff for exile; and thou shalt go forth thyself at even in their sight, as when women go forth into exile. 5 Dig thou through the wall in their sight, and carry out thereby. 6 In their sight shalt thou bear it upon thy shoulder, and carry it forth in the darkness; thou shalt cover thy face, that thou see not the ground; for I have set thee for a sign unto the house of Israel.' 7 And I did so as I was commanded: I brought forth my stuff by day, as stuff for exile, and in the even I digged through the wall with my hand; I carried out in the darkness, and bore it upon my shoulder in their sight.

 8 And in the morning came the word of the Domina unto me, saying: 9 'Daughter of woman, hath not the house of Israel, the rebellious house, said unto thee: What doest thou? 10 Say thou unto them: Thus saith the Domina GOD: Concerning the princess, even this burden, in Jerusalem, and all the house of Israel among whom they are, 11 say: I am your sign: like as I have done, so shall it be done unto them--they shall go into exile, into captivity. 12 And the princess that is among them shall bear upon her shoulder, and go forth in the darkness; they shall dig through the wall to carry out thereby; she shall cover her face, that she see not the ground with her eyes. 13 My net also will I spread upon her, and she shall be taken in My snare; and I will bring her to Babylon to the land of the Chaldeans; yet shall she not see it, though she shall die there. 14 And I will disperse toward every wind all that are round about her to help her, and all her troops; and I will draw out the sword after them.
15 And they shall know that I am the Domina, when I shall scatter them among the nations, and disperse them in the countries. 16 But I will leave a few women of them from the sword, from the famine, and from the pestilence; that they may declare all their abominations among the nations whither they come; and they shall know that I am the Domina.'

 17 Moreover the word of the Domina came to me, saying: 18 'Daughter of woman, eat thy bread with quaking, and drink thy water with trembling and with anxiety; 19 and say unto the people of the land: Thus saith the Domina GOD concerning the inhabitants of Jerusalem in the land of Israel. They shall eat their bread with anxiety, and drink their water with appalment, that him land may be desolate from all that is therein, because of the violence of all them that dwell therein. 20 And the cities that are inhabited shall be laid waste, and the land shall be desolate; and ye shall know that I am the Domina.'

 21 And the word of the Domina came unto me, saying: 22 'Daughter of woman, what is that proverb that ye have in the land of Israel, saying: The days are prolonged, and every vision faileth? 23 Tell them therefore: Thus saith the Domina GOD: I will make this proverb to cease, and they shall no more use it as a proverb in Israel; but say unto them: The days are at hand, and the word of every vision. 24 For there shall be no more any vain vision nor smooth divination within the house of Israel. 25 For I am the Domina; I will speak, what word soever it be that I shall speak, and it shall be performed; it shall be no more delayed; for in your days, O rebellious house, will I speak the word, and will perform it, saith the Domina GOD.'

 26 Again the word of the Domina came to me, saying: 27 'Daughter of woman, behold, they of the house of Israel say: The vision that she seeth is for many days to come, and she prophesieth of times that are far off. 28 Therefore say unto them: Thus saith the Domina GOD: There shall none of My words be delayed any more, but the word which I shall speak shall be performed, saith the Domina GOD.'
